All models were trained for 200 epochs, using Adam optimizer. Bell and Gaussian used lr=0.01, and Sigmoid used lr=0.005. 
All models used a scheduler with patience equal to 10, and a decreasing factor of 1e-1. Gaussian and Sigmoid have 39 parameters,
while Bell has 45. The ANN trained has 2305.

Sigmoid (100)

RMSE: 0.0379
MAE: 0.0210
R2: 0.9150

Bell (100)

RMSE: 0.0259
MAE: 0.0145
R2: 0.9602

Gaussian (100)

RMSE: 0.0478
MAE: 0.0283
R2: 0.8649

Sigmoid (200)

RMSE: 0.0235
MAE: 0.0119
R2: 0.9643

RMSE: 0.0197
MAE: 0.0110
R2: 0.9749

RMSE: 0.0196
MAE: 0.0126
R2: 0.9753
